fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Unleash the force of chaos and change a player's role each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The players new role must always be of the same alignment as their previous one.
- A player will be notified their role has been changed the next day.
- The player's chosen target(s) will remain the same after being converted, but the effects on them will conform to the player's new role. (If a Lookout became a Vigilante, they will kill the person they wanted to watch.)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Change 5 players' roles and cause as much chaos as you can.
